comments:
Hello,

I use sdk V3.1.2 M20060118-1600. On a method I tried references > Workspace. In the result I miss some JSPs I created earlier.

Before I used SDK V2.1.3 with Lomboz. All JSPs I created are not included into the search results.

JSPs I created within the V3 SDK are covered. In my .log I found an Exception seems to me the reason for it:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.core 4 4 2006-11-10 13:38:09.932
!MESSAGE Background Indexer Crash Recovery
!STACK 0
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 0
	at java.lang.String.charAt(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.index.DiskIndex.writeAllDocumentNames(DiskIndex.java:755)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.index.DiskIndex.mergeWith(DiskIndex.java:461)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.index.Index.save(Index.java:161)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexManager.saveIndex(IndexManager.java:524)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexManager.saveIndexes(IndexManager.java:568)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.search.indexing.IndexManager.notifyIdle(IndexManager.java:387)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.search.processing.JobManager.run(JobManager.java:355)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I tried even to delete the whole project and import again from existing project (using ClearCase snapshot view), but this does not help either.

Do I really need to re-create all old JSPs so they are covered in the search?

Why does this exception did not popup in the SDK, so I know my search results are not correct? I want to trust the search!

Best regards
Frank Leja

Which version of WTP were you using before and which version now, is this a Lomboz specific bug?  The log also indicates some problems with your CC sync state, do you still see a problem when you resolve that?

(In reply to comment #2)
> Which version of WTP were you using before and which version now, is this a
> Lomboz specific bug?  The log also indicates some problems with your CC sync
> state, do you still see a problem when you resolve that?

Before I used Eclipse 2.1.3 with Lomboz 2.1.3 (strange, but true). When I upgraded Eclipse I converted the workspace. Seems to me that in this process not all is going well. 
My CC errors came from the try to delete the whole project from my workspace and imported in again. But this does not fix the references search problem, unfortunately. Now  my CC is in correct state.
I found out that I can solve the problem by only changing the old JSPs. Checking it out and adding a blank somewhere make the JSPs catched by the references search. Will go for my 60 JSPs.
Again, which version of WTP are you using now?
sorry, issue came out of focus. Use SDK for Web Standard Tools 1.0.1.v200602130105.
